key.name: extension-version
key.description: Extension version for display in extension preferences.

key.name: status-icons-name-to-hide
key.summary: Array of status icon name to hide.
key.description: An array of strings which denotes the name of status icon to collapse (hide).

key.name: deep-search-status-icons
key.summary: Use deep search for status icon.
key.description: Use deep search (over all the three Main.panel._{left,center,right}Box) rather than a simple search via Main.panel.statusArea. Since the deep search uses underscore property, it might be breaks (changed by Gnome Developer) in the future. Use at your own risk.

key.name: ignore-invisible-icons
key.summary: Ignore invisible icons in the "List of active icon" option.
key.description: Generally, icons are invisible because they are inactive. Therefore, invisible icons might be disabled by the official method (so it might not be good to hide them via this extension).

key.name: display-raw-icon-obj-name
key.summary: Display the raw status icon object's name.
key.description: This denotes whether to display the raw object's name in the list of icon as well. Could be useful to determine which icon to add.
